message.body: I watched stonk play and then went out at like 8pm to pick up a copy
ive been busy with a bunch of stuff that I couldnt play til yesterday night
I havent even touched city trial somehow, I've been having fun with base air ride and some of roadtrip
this hour pointer seems wrong, or the minute pointer. i am upset
also i have still not escaped 16px hell himura67OhNo
Of course, how could I forget that masterpiece ðŸ˜Œ
According to my review "The fourth boss has an error, but you can ignore it to avoid a crash." So I assume it's not online's fault
cant wait for this to just loop and pull the first attack again
im so good at calling it
I like the telegraphing that exists
gotta love how attacks range from trivial to unreactable
it is physically impossible to react if you go by that visual cue, that's a power move
so is this legally an avoidance
well yeah, but the order is so painfully the same *and* the step counter is on screen, ya know
yeah, it's just this feels a lot... very... egregious I guess
its still funny hearing the crunchy laser into immediate cutoff from a restart
I kinda didn't see it at first when cosmo said "gate lasers" but now I understand TagWSad
it just *looks* like it should be more spacious, but Of Course
do you enjoy this world or whatever now as foretold, he's killed you plenty of times now
What did he mean by this
ngl I also prefer watching this to the boss
yeah bitcoin i'm surprised has kept its high for so long
How's the price of gold today?
And then we realized how bad the paper mario games could get with sticker star
SPM also isn't turn-based, so people didn't like that change (but the story is generally considered good)
I heard color splash is fine and origami king is better than fine
origami king combat is the weak point of it
I played sticker just to see how bad it was, and the worst thing about it is that it's mind numbingly boring
it looks like part of a badge
If you get it say got it
all the background tiles im guessing
as someone mostly listening but not watching
can't you reach from the next one?
Could you not start from the left save
the worst thing about sticker star is that there's no basic attack that takes no resources, so you want to constantly avoid combat because you keep losing resources with combat slmBleh
oh, no, it was just fast
I did a weekly mix of 25-11 of my own level selection
Can you play it when you finish this game?
these squarely spinning cherries remind me of world's hardest game over and over again
eh, the boss gives pressure that makes it unwise to stay in the middle and spam anyway
well whoops, I was watching arzztt not doing that, and thought "that's smart" PopCorn
based pick tho, those games slapped
I forget what the first one is, but ham ham heartbreak is based
i recognise that name and i only know good things about it
Yeah it's the evil blue non-partner rocky
it's probably more because of the aesthetic, but i'm reminded of GB

Holy shit amazing mirror ost i think so im taking extra mental damage
kirby air riders is so old already
They should've m9'd you for going in there
for some reason it kinda has pikmin energy even though its definitely not
i think this maker likes triggers
best thing about the first boss was that it was like palate cleanser after last game
I like this Mario galaxy song
I would pronounce it a bit differently, but ðŸ¤·
quantitAtive with that a as [a] not [ay]

can't wait for the final fourth, the beast from the middle
the trap is the no traps (it flies right at the end)

hey it could be charr thats lucky star

I guess that's why they die to it
if H2O is so good why is there no H4O

that had too much quality, lower the bitrate a little
It's kind of like a headless guy carrying the save in one hand and lifting the rest of the room with his other
what's wild is that there's both an hp bar and a timer
Gotta put a lil something there for the avoidanceheads y'know
Shoutouts to I wanna be the my third game
Surely Ancient 2 will have better bosses
the other bosses didn't have enough going on in them, so they compensated with this boss
i be makin some MEAN slop fo today. this shit is for HUMANS.
yeah kirby air riders looks sick as fuck
it's not last, the music still restarts
are they using a custom engine?
cause every aiwana engine ever has proper music handling nowadays
thats giving someone who makes a game like this far too much credit
what if the stars were triggers

then again like, I remember Anomaly where Randy would just refuse to use the engine's audio handling and just handled the audio himself, and I was too lazy to fix it at the time resulting in 3 copies of the anomaly song in the project file
one of which was a wava
so maybe in this case it was a moment like this too
so does the red button at least do something funny
back in that loser pit sort of formation
i see why dimentio did not have a video on boss 6
this looks like music 2 without the hits allowance
damn the slowest attack in the fight
It's been one of those days...
nm its not hp bar per attack it's weak sauce
now that must be passing nal's destination vibe test despite the hp bar
eh i think it's just a boss fight at this point
it just has visual indicators for what attack is happening
ok i off to share the slop at a party
yeah this seems like a good boss for the most part except for refreshing iframes
i say not being able to see every attack
some of the orange fruits are cropped
is it beyond doubt that the refreshing iframes are accidental
I've definitely seen intentional refreshing iframes before, but most of the time yeah, maker didn't know better
can't wait for an attack that throws in a couple of fruit from each color at the same time, and is totally balanced
oh purple 2 is some blue 2 shenaniganery
man orange 2 really leads to some rough trnasitions
yeah the middle is death on light blue
it's good that there are both avoidances and ances
